data.title: El Al cancels all flights, Israel continues striking Iran nuclear sites
data.description: The company confirmed it is acting in accordance with instructions from the country's security and aviation authorities.
data.keywords: El Al, Iran, will israel attack iran, Operation Rising Lion
data.snippet:
El Al aircraft (credit: AVSHALOM SASSONI)

Customers with flights between June 13 and 28 can convert their tickets into credit vouchers for future use. Addition...
